articles.title: John Aylward, 'ER' and 'The West Wing' actor, dies at 75: 'A great friend to many' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Actor John Aylward, best known for his roles on the dramas “ER” and “The West Wing,” died on Monday at his Seattle home of natural causes. He was 75.
